parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set brightness of light.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> light [[setLightBrightness]] brightness

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> light: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> brightness: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myLight [[setLightBrightness]] 2;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setLightAmbient]], [[setLightColor]], [[lightAttachObject]], [[lightDetachObject]], [[setLightIntensity]], [[setLightAttenuation]], [[setLightUseFlare]], [[setLightFlareSize]], [[setLightFlareMaxDistance]], [[setLightDayLight]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Dec 1, 2006 - 16:42</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Feersum|Feersum]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Light can be created with command [[createVehicleLocal]] with special vehicle class "#lightpoint"

<br>for example:
<code>_light = "#lightpoint" [[createVehicleLocal]] pos;
_light [[setLightBrightness]] 1.0;
_light [[setLightAmbient]] [0.0, 1.0, 0.0];
_light [[setLightColor]] [0.0, 1.0, 0.0];
_light [[lightAttachObject]] [_object, [0,0,0]];
</code>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Mar 24, 2014 - 23:27</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]<dd class="note">In <template><title>arma3</title></template> ver1.14 [[setLightBrightness]] will overwrite the previous effect processed by [[setLightIntensity]] on the same light source, vice versa. And both of them currently play the same role on brightness, for example: <code>_light [[setLightBrightness]] 1;// same as _light [[setLightIntensity]] 3000;</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
